sentences.sContent: Every problem you have is your responsibility, regardless of who caused it.
sentences.sContent_eng: Every problem you have is your responsibility, regardless of who caused it.
sentences.sCn: 不管是谁造成的，你都需要对你面对的每个问题负全责。

sentences.sContent: The fields give high and stable yields regardless of climatic circumstances.
sentences.sContent_eng: The fields give high and stable yields regardless of climatic circumstances.
sentences.sCn: 不管天气条件如何， 这块地总是保持稳产高产。

sentences.sContent: The new tax laws were rammed through regardless of the opposition of the majority of the people.
sentences.sContent_eng: The new tax laws were rammed through regardless of the opposition of the majority of the people.
sentences.sCn: 不顾大多数人民的反对，新的税法强行通过了。
